key.value: "The Star Generator is in danger! The Arcada is under attack! You'd better get off this scow if you value your life, Wilco."

value.value: "천체 발전기가 위험에 처했어! 아르카다가 공격받고 있다구! 자네 삶을 중요히 여기거든 이 배에서 도망치는 게 좋겠네, 윌코."

key.value: The old scientist doesn't appear healthy. In fact, his small intestine is about to unwind onto the floor.

key.value: These lights have something to do with the Data Archive Unit, though you don't really know what. They do seem to indicate that the unit is still operational.

key.value: Through the metallic lattice you glimpse still another hallway below.

key.value: That's not possible. It's so dark that you couldn't find your own navel lint. Surely you MUST remember that this was the criteria by which you came to choose this location for your nap... er... work station.

value.value: 흥분하여 약간 바보가 된 조사용 로봇입니다. 긴장 상태를 늦추기 위해 이완치료법을 가르쳐 줘야 할 것 같군요.

key.value: It's all that remains of Jerry, one of the few technodudes aboard who sometimes tolerated your company. Your low clearance excluded you from visiting him during the performance of his duties in the elegant lower level airlock of the Arcada.

key.value: A cursory glance indicates that Dave, a lab technician, is dead. Normally you wouldn't be able to tell, except that his intestines are hanging out of the scorched opening where his abdominal wall used to be. You remember that he was forced to serve in the Xenon National Guard (but he wasn't bitter).

key.value: This is the Star Generator Development Laboratory. Due to your incredibly low security clearance, you have never had access to this room. What a mess! Wreckage clutters the middle of the floor. A pair of lab workers have been blasted from the roster of the living. You're glad somebody else has to clean this up!

value.value: This is the Star Generator Development Laboratory. Due to your incredibly low security clearance, you have never had access to this room. What a mess! key.value: The lifeless body of Randy, one of the lab technicians, lies sprawled at your feet. Those laser blasts are nasty. Why, you can't distinguish one exposed organ from another.

value.value: The lifeless body of Randy, one of the lab technicians, lies sprawled at your feet. Those laser blasts are nasty. Why, you can't distinguish one exposed organ from another.

key.value: The architects must have been low on oxygen when they came up with the design scheme for this compartment. It's a giant tribute to an ancient, but still functional, control device.

value.value: The architects must have been low on oxygen when they came up with the design scheme for this compartment. It's a giant tribute to an ancient, but still functional, control device.

key.value: Here, we have a nice chunk of floor space dedicated to a cursor control device named after an annoying rodent. What were they thinking?

key.value: This place is most interesting, indeed. A mixture of both old and new technologies makes you wonder about its origin. Or at least about its tech support. On one side of the chamber is a primitive steam generator. Its pistons, pounding rhythmically, turn steam into useful energy. On the other side is what appears to be a computer console.

value.value: This place is most interesting, indeed. A mixture of both old and new technologies makes you wonder about its origin. Or at least about its tech support. On one side of the chamber is a primitive steam generator. Its pistons, pounding rhythmically, turn steam into useful energy. On the other side is what appears to be a computer console.

value.value: The floor in this place is made of polished slate. It is impeccably clean. With all this steam, the Keronians undoubtedly use it to steam clean just about everything.

key.value: As described, it is a sand skimmer and it looks like it has skimmed quite a bit of sand in its time. On it is a panel which has a small readout, currently dark, and a keyhole with a key in it.

value.value: As described, it is a sand skimmer and it looks like it has skimmed quite a bit of sand in its time. On it is a panel which has a small readout, currently dark, and a keyhole with a key in it.

key.value: The ladder appears to have been put here to make it easier to board the skimmer.

value.value: The ladder appears to have been put here to make it easier to board the skimmer.

key.value: These glass tubes are really quite intriguing - you've never seen anything remotely like them. Must be some radical new technology.

value.value: These glass tubes are really quite intriguing - you've never seen anything remotely like them. Must be some radical new technology.

key.value: These people of Kerona sure are an odd-looking lot. You can't pin it down, but you are sure something is different about them.

value.value: These people of Kerona sure are an odd-looking lot. You can't pin it down, but you are sure something is different about them.

key.value: The Keronian is hovering a meter or so off the floor on what appears to be a Kamen Kruiser, something like the one you used to buzz the family dog with as a young child.

value.value: The Keronian is hovering a meter or so off the floor on what appears to be a Kamen Kruiser, something like the one you used to buzz the family dog with as a young child.

key.value: The shaft must be part of the steam generator.

value.value: The shaft must be part of the steam generator.

key.value: The old Keronian guy looks friendly enough, but his color makes you wonder if he's getting enough oxygen.

value.value: The old Keronian guy looks friendly enough, but his color makes you wonder if he's getting enough oxygen.

key.value: Some steam is escaping from the generator. That explains why this place is so humid.

key.value: steam escaping from the pipes.

value.value: steam escaping from the pipes.

key.value: "Please, don't be alarmed. We intend no harm. We are a peaceful race. We are cautious, however. Others don't share our way of life. Welcome to Kerona."

value.value: "Please, don't be alarmed. We intend no harm. We are a peaceful race. We are cautious, however. Others don't share our way of life. Welcome to Kerona."

key.value: "You are standing in the power generation facility of our underground settlement. All power here is produced by steam. That is unimportant to you, however. We have promised you transportation."

value.value: "You are standing in the power generation facility of our underground settlement. All power here is produced by steam. That is unimportant to you, however. We have promised you transportation."

key.value: "It is a Skimmer. It hovers approximately 1/2 meter above the traveling surface. This is very important because of Grell."

value.value: "It is a Skimmer. It hovers approximately 1/2 meter above the traveling surface. This is very important because of Grell."

key.value: "Grell and his like dwell in caves below the sand. If you stand on the surface too long, you chance becoming a rare moist meal for him."

value.value: "Grell and his like dwell in caves below the sand. If you stand on the surface too long, you chance becoming a rare moist meal for him."

key.value: "The skimmer is programmed to take you to a settlement on the other side of Kerona called Ulence Flats. You can make further travel arrangements there."

value.value: "The skimmer is programmed to take you to a settlement on the other side of Kerona called Ulence Flats. You can make further travel arrangements there."

key.value: "I am sorry this is all we can offer. I hope your trip is a safe one. Board the skimmer when you are ready to depart. Good luck, strange one."

value.value: "I am sorry this is all we can offer. I hope your trip is a safe one. Board the skimmer when you are ready to depart. Good luck, strange one."

value.value: This gauge tells the amount of damage done to the skimmer.

key.value: Impossible to miss is the incredibly rotund owner, Tiny. The jaw jockey is most certainly an unusual-looking being. He looks very much like a fish who has swallowed its fishbowl.

key.value: "I've got a coupl'a other fine ships just to the north of here. Whad'ya say, sport. Shall we go give 'em a gander?"

key.value: I'd like to take your money, pal. But, even I wouldn't sell you the same ship twice.

value.value: I'd like to take your money, pal. But, even I wouldn't sell you the same ship twice.

key.value: "So, what are ya trying to pull? If you don't have the cash you can hit the road. Go on, get out of here. You're wasting my time!"

value.value: "So, what are ya trying to pull? If you don't have the cash you can hit the road. Go on, get out of here. You're wasting my time!"

key.value: "I tell ya, I think you've made a wise decision. She's a beauty. The keys are in her. If you have any problems don't hesitate to come back and tell us about 'em."

key.value: What do you want now? I was just about finished with my internal diagnostics check. Now I'm going to have to recalibrate my photo-electric scanner membranes and begin all over again.

key.value: Carbon-based life-forms can be sooo trying sometimes. If you haven't purchased a robot, I have nothing for you. Now, go away!

key.value: (Sigh!) How depressing. Let's begin again from the start and proceed veeerrrryyyy sssslllooowwwllly. I do NOT want to be disturbed. You ARE disturbing me. GO AWAY! Thank you so much.

key.value: I am programmed to defend myself against all attacks. Even against such a laughable attempt at destruction as this. It would be a shame to expend the energy required to kill you, don't you agree? Yes, I thought you would.

value.value: You are standing in the upper level of one of the Deltaur's hallways. You can't help but be impressed with the subtle decorating and color sense shown by the Sariens in their ship design.

key.value: The globes crackle with many colors of light and, you suspect, even less healthful manifestations of the electromagnetic spectrum.

value.value: The globes crackle with many colors of light and, you suspect, even less healthful manifestations of the electromagnetic spectrum.

key.value: It looks like some kind of cartridge reader. Maybe the cartridge you have will work in it.

value.value: It looks like some kind of cartridge reader. Maybe the cartridge you have will work in it.

key.value: A tiny little sign tacked on the front reads: Witzend Coil. Disconnect from power supply before servicing.

value.value: A tiny little sign tacked on the front reads: Witzend Coil. Disconnect from power supply before servicing.

key.value: I give up. YOU tell ME what it is.

value.value: I give up. YOU tell ME what it is.

key.value: It looks like some type of experimental orifice.

value.value: It looks like some type of experimental orifice.

key.value: This seems to be just another visually confusing hallway between someplace and someplace else aboard the Deltaur.

value.value: This seems to be just another visually confusing hallway between someplace and someplace else aboard the Deltaur.

key.value: These egg-shaped lights - if that's what they are - are just another example of the rather whimsical designs you've observed on this ship. For ugly, smelly, green, planet- destroying murderers, the Sariens appear to have a great sense of aesthetics.

value.value: These egg-shaped lights - if that's what they are - are just another example of the rather whimsical designs you've observed on this ship. For ugly, smelly, green, planet- destroying murderers, the Sariens appear to have a great sense of aesthetics.

key.value: It's a port of some kind. You've seen more empty space than you care to ever again.

value.value: It's a port of some kind. You've seen more empty space than you care to ever again.

key.value: Those are some weird globes. They aren't operating at this time.

value.value: Those are some weird globes. They aren't operating at this time.

key.value: You don't really like the way the red floor and green walls clash but, all in all, its a pretty nice looking room.

value.value: You don't really like the way the red floor and green walls clash but, all in all, its a pretty nice looking room.

value.value: A panel of flashing lights.

key.value: Fantastic technology... isn't it?

value.value: Fantastic technology... isn't it?

value.value: It's a panel of lights.

key.value: Since your X-ray Vision Specs have not yet arrived in the mail, you don't even know this room is over here, so quit messing around and do something useful.

value.value: Since your X-ray Vision Specs have not yet arrived in the mail, you don't even know this room is over here, so quit messing around and do something useful.

key.value: You're uncertain whether this is a Walwoodian cryobaric hypersleep chamber or the transmission out of a late model Buick Skylark.

value.value: You're uncertain whether this is a Walwoodian cryobaric hypersleep chamber or the transmission out of a late model Buick Skylark.

key.value: It appears to be a standard driver-side rear view mirror, probably standard on all ships of this class.

value.value: It appears to be a standard driver-side rear view mirror, probably standard on all ships of this class.

key.value: Two zapping, crackling globes spew forth gargantuan amounts of sizzling raw energy. Kinda neat, huh?

value.value: Two zapping, crackling globes spew forth gargantuan amounts of sizzling raw energy. Kinda neat, huh?

key.value: You surmise this is a Sarien enlisted being.

value.value: You surmise this is a Sarien enlisted being.

key.value: One of those gruesome red-suited Sariens is patrolling the hallways, looking for intruders to toast.

value.value: One of those gruesome red-suited Sariens is patrolling the hallways, looking for intruders to toast.

key.value: This is where the Sariens placed the Star Generator after lifting it from the Arcada.

value.value: This is where the Sariens placed the Star Generator after lifting it from the Arcada.

key.value: The left hand force field emitter, much like the right, radiates an unknown form of energy that keeps you from approaching the Star Generator.

value.value: The left hand force field emitter, much like the right, radiates an unknown form of energy that keeps you from approaching the Star Generator.

key.value: The right hand force field emitter, in a fashion altogether similar to the left hand one, beams an inexplicable power into the vicinity of the Star Generator that makes it impossible to get near.

value.value: The right hand force field emitter, in a fashion altogether similar to the left hand one, beams an inexplicable power into the vicinity of the Star Generator that makes it impossible to get near.

key.value: Cowabunga, Wilco - this is IT! It's the unimaginably powerful Star Generator, which must not, at any cost, be allowed to remain in the hands of the evil Sariens! (but you knew that, right?)

value.value: Cowabunga, Wilco - this is IT! It's the unimaginably powerful Star Generator, which must not, at any cost, be allowed to remain in the hands of the evil Sariens! (but you knew that, right?)

key.value: The pulsing energy surging from the Star Generator tells you that it has been activated and you had better quit hanging around staring at the pretty colors.

key.value: Looking into the vast reaches of space gives you the curious illusion of being tiny, unimportant, insignificant, negligible, and totally irrelevant in the scheme of things. Then you realize it's not an illusion.

value.value: It's an elevator, much like the ones you used to waste time in aboard the Arcada.

value.value: 엘리베이터입니다.

key.value: "Roger Wilco, we, the people of Xenon, extend our limitless appreciation and eternal gratitude for your acts of heroism."

value.value: "Roger Wilco, we, the people of Xenon, extend our limitless appreciation and eternal gratitude for your acts of heroism."

key.value: "Because of your bravery, the planet Xenon, and indeed the entire galaxy, has been saved from domination by the evil (not to mention ugly) Sariens."

value.value: "Because of your bravery, the planet Xenon, and indeed the entire galaxy, has been saved from domination by the evil (not to mention ugly) Sariens."

key.value: "Now, if you'd only been smart enough to bring along the data cartridge containing the construction specifications, we'd be able build a new Star Generator, thereby saving Xenon from the horrors of a rapidly cooling planet. Oh, well. You are just a janitor."

value.value: "Now, if you'd only been smart enough to bring along the data cartridge containing the construction specifications, we'd be able build a new Star Generator, thereby saving Xenon from the horrors of a rapidly cooling planet. Oh, well. You are just a janitor."

key.value: "It is my honor to present you with the coveted Golden Mop, a symbol of pride and accomplishment to members of your esteemed profession."

value.value: "It is my honor to present you with the coveted Golden Mop, a symbol of pride and accomplishment to members of your esteemed profession."

key.value: "Henceforth and for all time you will be known as Hero of Xenon."

value.value: "Henceforth and for all time you will be known as Hero of Xenon."

key.value: Whoa! Those big guys pack a powerful appetite. Did you feel the way that thing just chomped right through your skeletal system? That had to hurt! The grell burps in solitary satisfaction. He doesn't often get nice, warm meals like you.

key.value: A wide selection of skeletal accessories awaits your perusal. Vertebrae, ribs, and who knows what else rest upon the Keronian soil. The average height of this structure looks to be at least 7 meters. Good thing you didn't meet this thing in its heyday.

key.value: The spider is quite relentless in its pursuit of organic beings. Your quandry is that, to the best of your knowledge, you are the only one in the area fitting that description.

key.value: Although you've always had an appreciation for the gases of the universe, this one proved a bit overwhelming. It really was a great idea, though. However, you should have chosen a victim not so close to yourself. Better choice next time.
